headline: Ameren Announces Public Offering of Common Stock with a Forward Component
summary: Ameren Corporation (NYSE: AEE) announced today the offering of $520,000,000 of shares of its common stock in an underwritten offering. Subject to certain conditions, all shares are expected to be borrowed by the forward counterparties (as defined below) (or their respective affiliates) from third parties and sold to the underwriters and offered in connection with the forward sale agreements described below. Goldman Sachs & Co. LLC, J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, Barclays, and Wells Fargo Securities
